seo.title: Expert Bathroom Remodeling in Strongsville, OH | Free Quote
seo.description: Transform your bathroom with Strongsville's top-rated remodeling experts. 5-year warranty, licensed contractors, free design consultation. Call (440) 555-1234 today!

hero.h1Headline: Expert Bathroom Remodeling in Strongsville, OH
hero.subheadline: Transform your bathroom into a luxurious retreat. Licensed contractors, 5-year warranty, and free design consultation included with every project.
hero.imageAlt: Modern bathroom remodel with white subway tiles, walk-in shower, and contemporary fixtures in Strongsville, Ohio

benefits.title: Licensed & Insured Professionals
benefits.description: All our contractors are fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your peace of mind and protection.

benefits.title: 5-Year Quality Guarantee
benefits.description: We stand behind our work with an industry-leading 5-year warranty on all materials and labor.

benefits.title: Free Design Consultation
benefits.description: Get expert design advice at no cost. We'll help you create the bathroom of your dreams within your budget.

benefits.title: Fast Project Completion
benefits.description: Most bathroom remodels completed in 2-3 weeks. We respect your schedule and minimize disruption.

benefits.title: Flexible Scheduling
benefits.description: Evening and weekend appointments available. We work around your busy life.

benefits.title: Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed
benefits.description: 4.9/5 star rating from over 2,800 customers. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

processSteps.title: Free Consultation
processSteps.description: Schedule your complimentary in-home design consultation to discuss your vision and budget.

processSteps.title: Design & Quote
processSteps.description: Receive a detailed design plan with 3D renderings and an accurate project estimate.

processSteps.title: Material Selection
processSteps.description: Choose from our premium selection of fixtures, tiles, and finishes at our showroom.

processSteps.title: Demolition & Prep
processSteps.description: Our team carefully removes old fixtures and prepares the space for renovation.

processSteps.title: Installation
processSteps.description: Expert installation of all plumbing, electrical, tile work, and fixtures.

processSteps.title: Final Inspection
processSteps.description: Thorough quality check and walkthrough to ensure everything meets our standards.

faqs.question: How much does a bathroom remodel cost?
faqs.answer: The cost of a bathroom remodel varies based on the size of the space, materials selected, and scope of work. On average, a full bathroom remodel in Strongsville ranges from $10,000 to $25,000. A simple refresh with new fixtures and paint may cost $5,000-$8,000, while a luxury master bath renovation can reach $30,000-$50,000. We provide detailed, itemized quotes during your free consultation so you know exactly what to expect—no hidden fees or surprises.

faqs.question: How long does a typical bathroom renovation take?
faqs.answer: Most bathroom remodels take 2-4 weeks from start to finish, depending on the complexity of the project. A powder room refresh might be completed in 1-2 weeks, while a full master bath with custom tile work, new plumbing, and electrical updates typically takes 3-4 weeks. We'll provide you with a detailed timeline during your consultation and keep you informed every step of the way.

faqs.question: Do I need permits for bathroom remodeling?
faqs.answer: Yes, most bathroom remodels require permits, especially if you're doing plumbing, electrical, or structural work. We handle all permit applications and inspections for you as part of our service. This ensures your renovation meets all local building codes and protects your investment. Permit costs are included in your project quote.

faqs.question: Can I use my bathroom during the renovation?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, your bathroom will not be usable during the active renovation period. We recommend planning ahead if this is your only bathroom—perhaps staying with family or using a portable facility. However, we work efficiently to minimize downtime and always clean up thoroughly at the end of each day. For multi-bathroom homes, we can often schedule work to ensure you have at least one functioning bathroom.

faqs.question: What's included in your 5-year warranty?
faqs.answer: Our 5-year warranty covers all labor and workmanship, including tile installation, plumbing connections, fixture installation, and custom carpentry. If any issue arises from our work within 5 years, we'll return to fix it at no charge. Materials are covered by their manufacturer warranties (typically 1-10 years depending on the product). We also provide a lifetime warranty on certain premium fixtures when selected.

faqs.question: Do you offer financing options?
faqs.answer: Yes! We partner with several financing companies to offer flexible payment plans with competitive rates. Options include 12-month same-as-cash financing, low-interest loans up to 10 years, and special promotional rates for qualified buyers. We'll help you explore all available financing options during your free consultation to find a plan that fits your budget.

faqs.question: Can you match my existing tile or fixtures?
faqs.answer: We'll do our best! If you're doing a partial remodel and need to match existing materials, bring us photos and we'll search our supplier network. However, tile and fixture lines change frequently, so exact matches aren't always possible. In many cases, we recommend considering a full room refresh with complementary new materials—it often looks better and costs less than tracking down discontinued products.

faqs.question: What if I want to change the layout of my bathroom?
faqs.answer: Layout changes are absolutely possible and often transform a cramped, dated bathroom into a spacious, functional space. Moving plumbing fixtures (toilet, shower, sink) does add cost and complexity, but the results can be dramatic. During your design consultation, we'll discuss your vision, show you layout options, and provide accurate pricing for each scenario. We've successfully relocated fixtures in hundreds of bathrooms across Strongsville and Northeast Ohio.

faqs.question: Are walk-in showers better than tub/shower combos?
faqs.answer: It depends on your needs! Walk-in showers are popular for their modern look, accessibility, and ease of cleaning. However, if you have young children or plan to sell your home soon, having at least one bathtub in the house is recommended. We can help you evaluate your options during the design phase and make the best choice for your lifestyle and home value.

faqs.question: What happens if you discover mold or water damage during demolition?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, hidden mold and water damage are common in bathroom renovations, especially in older homes. If we discover issues during demolition, we'll document everything with photos, explain the problem, and provide a detailed quote for remediation. We never proceed with hidden damage repairs without your approval. Our team is certified in mold remediation and can handle most issues in-house, which saves you time and money compared to hiring a separate specialist.

testimonials.reviewText: The team did an incredible job transforming our outdated 1980s bathroom into a modern spa-like retreat. The attention to detail was outstanding, from the custom tile work to the perfectly installed rainfall shower. They completed the project on time and within budget. Communication was excellent throughout the entire process, and they cleaned up thoroughly every day. We couldn't be happier with the results and have already recommended them to our neighbors. The quality of workmanship is top-notch and the design consultation helped us make perfect choices for our space.

Outstanding service from start to finish. The crew was professional, courteous, and extremely skilled. Our master bathroom remodel exceeded our expectations. They handled everything from plumbing to electrical work with expertise. Highly recommended!

Very happy with our new bathroom. The team was punctual and respectful of our home. The only minor issue was a slight delay due to a backordered fixture, but they kept us informed and made it right. The final result is beautiful and functional. Worth every penny.

After getting quotes from three different contractors, we chose this team and we're so glad we did. The quality of their work is simply exceptional. Every detail was perfect - from the tile alignment to the grout lines to the fixture installation. They transformed our cramped bathroom into an open, luxurious space that adds real value to our home.

We were nervous about doing a full bathroom renovation, but this team made the entire process stress-free. They walked us through every step, offered great design suggestions, and completed the work in just three weeks. Our bathroom looks like it belongs in a luxury hotel. The heated floors and custom vanity are absolute game-changers. Thank you for the amazing work!
Great communication, fair pricing, and excellent results. Would hire again without hesitation.
